Economy.description: Commands related to the economy system.

commands.name: /mine
commands.description: Mine for valuable minerals and items.

commands.name: /fish
commands.description: Go fishing and catch some rare fish!

commands.name: /loot
commands.description: Loot for random items and credits.

commands.name: /shop
commands.description: Displays the items available for purchase.

commands.name: /buy
commands.description: Buy an item from the shop.

commands.name: /sell
commands.description: Sell an item from your inventory.

commands.name: /kick
commands.description: Kick a member from the server.

commands.name: /ban
commands.description: Ban a member from the server.

commands.name: /mute
commands.description: Mute a member in the server.

commands.name: /unmute
commands.description: Unmute a member in the server.

Miscellaneous.description: Other commands that are useful for various tasks.

commands.name: /profile
commands.description: View or set your profile details.

commands.name: /trivia
commands.description: Answer a trivia question to win credits!

commands.name: /gamble
commands.description: Gamble your credits and try your luck!

commands.name: /slots
commands.description: Try your luck at the slot machine!
